description: Students hone their skills of analyzing the forms and contexts of production and reception of German-language literary works of various genres. Coursework includes close reading, discussion, analysis, and interpretation of visual and/or written texts. Recent topics: authors as public intellectuals, die Fantasie, Frauenliteratur. Taught in German. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered in alternate years. Prerequisite: at least one 270-level course.
name: Top: Wissen und Wissenschaft
notes: Full topic title: Wissen, Wissenschaft(en), Wissenschaftler*innen
title: Topics in German Literature
